name: Moltres

passive.name: Firegiver
passive.effect: When you put this Pokemon into play (except during setup) roll a d4. Generate that many Fire Energies and put them into your hand.

attacks.name: Dive Bomb
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

flavor: A legendary bird Pokemon. As it flaps its wings, even the night sky will turn red.
